title: Jason Wright: Women's Sports Are The Small Caps of Sports
description: Jason Wright, former Washington Commanders president of operations, tells Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on "The Close" that Ariel Investments is deploying $250 million to build one of the largest women’s sports funds, calling women’s sports the “small caps” of the sports industry. (Source: Bloomberg)
